title.jp: Majestic? Journey to the New World!

synopsis: After a Golden Dragon attack pushes them into the sea, Lina and the crew inadvertently destroy the harbor. With no way to return to land, the gang begins a journey!

title.jp: Doubtful? a Letter from Home!

synopsis: When Lina's crew lands in search of food, Filia gives Inverse a letter from her sister and reveals that the gang has been chosen for an important mission.

title.jp: Where's That Arrogant Guy Going?

synopsis: In a land where the citizens are mystified by their amazing magic, Lina's gang encounters Xellos - and a powerful new enemy!

title.jp: On the Move! He's Out for Revenge?

synopsis: Valgaav is out for revenge, as well as Gourry's Sword of Light! When the villain retreats, Xellos warns that Inverse's magic might not be enough to stop him!

title.jp: A Wild Rumor? You Can't Have Smoke Without Fire?

synopsis: Filia encounters trouble in a town where her kind is not allowed. When Lina's gang rushes to help her, Xellos's insults unleash Filia's anger, and the whole town pays the price!

title.jp: Wandering Around? the Runaway Shrine Takes a Trip!

synopsis: As the gang nears the Fire Dragon temple, they find they can't use their magic! To get their powers back, Inverse unleashes the Dragon Slave - and as usual, does more harm than good.

title.jp: A Peace Conference? This Is the Dragon Shrine?

synopsis: After Lina rebuilds the castle, the Golden Dragons confess their doubts in her ability to complete the important mission. She better not let it bother her - Almayce is about to attack!

title.jp: Be Careful! The Plan Has Begun!

synopsis: Almayce reveals his intentions for the Sword of Light. When Valgaav moves to attack, Filia unseals Lina's magic and a battle erupts!

title.jp: Continuous Fire! The Wind-Swept Shore of Battle!

synopsis: Lina's gang ends up in the middle of a war between two rival nations. Aiding one side in the long-standing conflict could be Inverse's only path to freedom.

title.jp: Ready for Exile! Isn't Two People's Love Eternal?

synopsis: Gravos uses his powerful sword against Lina and the gang, and Inverse must rely on the Dragon Slave. Suddenly, after the island is destroyed, a bridge appears between the two kingdoms!

title.jp: The Hurdle's Cleared? Jillas' True Power!

synopsis: Within a dark castle, a shady guide causes Gourry to become separated from the gang. Possession of the Sword of Light is in the balance - will Jillas finally obtain the power he has sought?

title.jp: Selfless and Senseless! Pursuit Through the Labyrinth!

synopsis: With Jillas on the run, Lina's party must go their separate ways in a twisting labyrinth. They encounter Almayce, Xellos, and Filia, and learn shocking insight into Valgaav's intentions.

title.jp: An Explosive Situation! The One Who Holds the Key!

synopsis: Deep inside his lair, Valgaav confronts Lina, Gourry, Almayce and the others. When the villain gains control of the Sword of Light, he uses his power to transport Inverse's gang far away!

title.jp: Striding and Swaggering! Lamentation Without End!

synopsis: Valgaav is summoning Dark Star, forcing Lina to use her most powerful spells. As the gate between worlds closes, the scene is rocked by a giant explosion!

title.jp: Disaster and Danger? This Place Is a Wonder Island!

synopsis: Lina wanders an unfamiliar land with a pig as her guide. She finds Zelgadis acting strangely and uses her magic to break free from the odd realm - only to discover that Filia might not want to leave!

title.jp: Pandemonium! Terror of the Cursed Jar!

synopsis: Lina, Zelgadis, and Filia take to the sea to locate Gourry. They soon find themselves battling hordes of ghosts in exchange for the chance to claim a rare and powerful jar.

title.jp: Immediate Results? Love Is in the Tiny Differences!

synopsis: Amid sea monsters and cross-dressing, Amelia and Gourry get caught up in the romantic drama of fishy Layla and her human boyfriend.

title.jp: The Right Person in the Right Place! Amelia in the Village of Justice!

synopsis: Gourry and Amelia visit a land with a demon problem, and are tasked with confronting the creatures. Before the battle ends, they find that the "demons" are actually old familiar friends.

title.jp: Three People, Three Ways! Where the Light Leads!

synopsis: Almayce unleashes a horde of monsters to locate the last weapon, and only Lina and the gang can stop their rampage! When they encounter Jillas, he holds a weapon as powerful as Lina's mightiest spell!

title.jp: A Hero's Advent? For Whom Does the Young Girl Pray?

synopsis: In a crumbling village, one of Almayce's underlings takes on Lina's crew - and somehow ends up becoming a hero to the townsfolk!

title.jp: Savage and Unexplored! History Sealed Away!

synopsis: The history of the warring Dragons is revealed! Meanwhile, after Almayce attempts to keep Xellos from forming an alliance that could lead to Dark Star's emergence, the Golden Dragons appear!!

title.jp: Eternal Death, Final Farewells! A Cry to the Fallen!

synopsis: Xellos takes Filia hostage! Lina tries to help, and attacks Almayce with the coveted ultimate weapon - but the powerful bow soon falls in the wrong hands!

title.jp: No Time for Arguing! Head for the Showdown!

synopsis: Lina vows to stop the chaos that is thinning the ranks of the Golden Dragons, and the crew heads for Valgaav's lair. They better hurry - Xellos has plans for the Dark Star!

title.jp: No Way to Guess! the Forbidden Gateway Is Opened!

synopsis: Dark Star emerges before the gate can be closed, and Lina and the crew attack with all they've got! Just as the powerful entity seems to be defeated, he escapes - and Valgaav appears!

title.jp: He Who Emerges from Dark Star!

synopsis: Valgaav is unleashed! Filia and Jillas try to stop him, along with Lina's crew. As the powers of darkness reach unbelievable levels, Lina finds the Dragon Slave is worthless!

title.jp: Try Again! When All Returns to White!

synopsis: Just as it seems Valgaav cannot be defeated, Xellos and Filia give Lina the amazing magic power she needs to save the world.
